detaileddescription.para: Clipped triangle wave (param1 is the clipping threshold)
Square wave with smoothed transitions so no abrubt changes when used as a control source
Pulse wave (param1 is the duty cycle from 0.0 to 1.0)

briefdescription.para: : Transition time when new parameters are loaded
: Biquad filter order. The higher the order, the more intense the filtering effect

detaileddescription.para: Smooth polynomial clipping like tube distortion
Smoother polynomial clipping like tube distortion
Smooth polynomial clipping that is rectified like a fuzz pedal
Wave shaping with sine function - introduces interesting high frequencies components
